name: Hex Twitter Profile Template
description:
Now you can mint your own NFTs! Ha ha ha... ha.


Instructions

1/ Modify the profile pic component to whatever you want

2/ Click the Export artboard and export it.

3/ Set the exported png file as your profile picture on Twitter*


*You must use an app like Tweetbot for iOS, which allows you to upload a profile picture directly to Twitter. The Twitter webapp will ask you to resize your profile picture and as part of this process, will remove any transparency.


Edit: You can actually just click the ‚Üê Back button instead of the Apply button when the cropping UI comes up and that will also work.
